name: Match 3 RPG - Heroes of Elements
description:
Heroes of Elements is a challenging match 3 game with classic puzzle RPG game mechanics. Unleash the power of elemental magic in this heroic match 3 RPG adventure. Crush the Feng Shui Corporation in challenging match 3 battles. Join the fight!

Like other match-3 games, Heroes of Elements is easy to pick up and play, but the puzzle RPG mechanics make for an electrifying challenge. Level up your heroes to learn amazing skills, position your super heroes in different formations, and use the power of the elements to conquer your foes. Combine elemental advantages and match huge combos for massive damage in the ultimate puzzle RPG!


🔥❄️🍃 Heroes of Elements: free Match 3 RPG Features 🍃❄️🔥

Match 3 gameplay with an RPG twist - Merge the tiles that match your hero’s element for extra powerful hits against enemies big and small. Use the ring of elements to take advantage of elemental strengths and weaknesses in challenging match 3 battles. Match 4 or more at once to spawn special tiles that can clear entire rows and more.

Collect and upgrade your heroes - With 14 awesome heroes, 3 classes, 5 elements, and 4 skills for each hero to learn, you'll marvel at the possibilities! Level up your super heroes to learn new skills, then level up your skills for even more power! This puzzle quest puts you in control.

Build your team - Choose the right super heroes and arrange them in the best formation. Shield your healer behind a warrior, or line up 3 mages for maximum firepower. Heroes of Elements is more than just a free match 3 game, it's a match 3 RPG game, and a heroic puzzle quest.

Different ways to play - Enter the daily rift for a new challenge every day. Fight to the finish for a huge reward. You deserve it!

Daily rewards - Play every day for awesome free stuff. We love to reward our dedicated players, and we do everything we can to bring you the best puzzle RPG.

Share the fun - With daily leaderboard tournaments and PVP on the way, put your match 3 skills to the test in this heroic puzzle quest! You won't find a more challenging match 3 RPG than Heroes of Elements.

Marvelous futuristic environments - With beautiful art, a diverse cast of characters, and challenging match 3 gameplay, you'll marvel at the world of Heroes of Elements.
